references.reason: This paper provides a foundational method for multi-output prediction, which is the core problem tackled in this paper.

references.paper_title: A fast iterative shrinkage-thresholding algorithm for linear inverse problems
references.reason: This paper provides a fast algorithm for solving linear inverse problems, which is used as a subroutine for prediction in this paper.

references.paper_title: Sparse high-dimensional regression: Exact scalable algorithms and phase transitions
references.reason: This paper proposes exact scalable algorithms for sparse high-dimensional regression, which is a theoretical foundation for the algorithm used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Iterative hard thresholding for compressed sensing
references.reason: This paper provides an iterative algorithm for compressed sensing, which is a crucial part of the proposed framework in this paper.
This paper introduces linear programming methods for decoding in compressed sensing, providing a theoretical foundation for the sparsity-related parts of this paper.
